title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of decency.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who thrusts Gotham into anarchy.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in stories of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: Forrest, a man with a low IQ, recounts the early years of his life when he found himself in the middle of key historical events.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground club that evolves into something much more.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
overview: The Fellowship is broken, but the quest to destroy the One Ring continues.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
overview: The final confrontation for Middle-earth begins as Frodo reaches Mordor.

title: Interstellar
overview: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Social Network
overview: The founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed.

title: Parasite
overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory.

title: The Prestige
overview: Two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor.

title: The Lion King
overview: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after his father's murder.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A young girl enters a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

title: City of God
overview: The growth of organized crime in the suburbs of Rio de Janeiro.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the Titanic.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a global threat.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
overview: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat Thanos.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The remaining Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos's actions.

title: Joker
overview: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral.

title: La La Land
overview: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
overview: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort's rise and fall.

title: Shutter Island
overview: A U.S. Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility on an isolated island.

title: The Departed
overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other.

title: Se7en
overview: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned cannibal.

title: Saving Private Ryan
overview: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines.

title: The Green Mile
overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges.

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob.

title: Braveheart
overview: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion.

title: A Beautiful Mind
overview: John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, struggles with schizophrenia.

title: The Truman Show
overview: An insurance salesman discovers his life is a TV show.

title: Her
overview: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system.

title: Blade Runner 2049
overview: A young blade runner uncovers a long-buried secret.

title: Django Unchained
overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel.

title: The Imitation Game
overview: Alan Turing attempts to crack the Enigma code during WWII.

title: The Big Short
overview: The financial crisis of 2007-2008 is explored by several key players.

title: Arrival
overview: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms.

title: Logan
overview: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X.

title: Black Panther
overview: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to take his place as king.

title: Get Out
overview: A young African-American man visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend.
